titles.title: To require the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP code for Miami Lakes, Florida.
To require the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP code for Miami Lakes, Florida.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: This bill directs the U.S. Postal Service, by September 30, 2017, to designate a single, unique ZIP code for Miami Lakes, Florida.
